articles.title: UltraTech-India Cements deal: what next for Dhoni, Srinivasan and CSK? - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Srinivasan family will continue to control the IPL team but lose hold in ICL; whether Dhoni will play next season is conditional to number of retentions permitted by BCCI
articles.content:
MS Dhoni's future as a player at CSK could depend on the No. of retentions allowed © BCCI/IPL
The proposed acquisition of India Cements Ltd (ICL) by UltraTech Cement, announced on Sunday (July 28), … [+4070 chars]

articles.title: Where are tech stocks and small caps going? Listen to Powell's press conference. - MarketWatch
articles.description: A rate cut isn’t expected in the coming week, but the Fed could signal if small-caps can keep up their winning streak
articles.content: A market-moving force could be about to hit a rapidly moving stock market.U.S. equities were extra jittery in the past week as investors navigated a sharp selloff in big-tech names and a rotation int… [+7068 chars]
